DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety meningococcal ACYW135 polysaccharide conjugate vaccine healthy volunteer age 3 Months
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Meningococcal ACYW135 Polysaccharide Conjugate Vaccine Healthy Volunteers Aged Above 3 Months
DOC.criteria: 311 month health infant n't immuned Meningococcal A C Conjugate Vaccine population 1 year old have't give boost immunity . Subject legal representative consent sign write informed consent . Subject did't immune live vaccine within 14 day inactivate vaccine within 7 day vaccination . Subject parent/guardian able comply study procedure . Axillary temperature ≤37.0 ℃ . History allergy，eclampsia , epilepsy , encephalopathy mental disease family disease . Allergic history vaccination . History meningitis infection disease . Acute Febrile illness Infectious Diseases . Febrile illness ( temperature ≥ 38°C ) 3 day . Immunodeficiency diseases patient administer immunosuppressive agent . Children within 1 year old abnormal labor , asphyxia rescue history , congenital malformation , genetic defect , eccyliosis severe chronic disease . Liver kidney cardiopulmonary disease，acute hypertension diabetes . In pregnancy lactation pregnant woman . Subject plan participate drug clinical trial . Meningococcal vaccine contraindication . Any condition , judgment investigator , may affect trial assessment .
